docs.snippet: Thursday was the last day at the White House for the 29-year-old from Connecticut, who followed an unlikely career path to become a presidential confidante.

headline.print_headline: A Longtime Trump Whisperer Packs Up, Leaving a Void in the White House
headline.main: Hope Hicks Is Gone, and It’s Not Clear Who Can Replace Her

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump has attended a dinner in Virginia at the home of a real estate developer who hosted a fundraiser for him in 2016.

headline.print_headline: Trump Attends Dinner at Home of Real Estate Developer
headline.main: Trump Attends Dinner at Home of Real Estate Developer

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump blasted California Gov. Jerry Brown on Saturday for his pardon of five ex-convicts facing deportation, including two who fled the Khmer Rouge regime in Cambodia with their families four decades ago.

headline.print_headline: Trump Blasts California Governor's Immigrant Pardons
headline.main: Trump Blasts California Governor's Immigrant Pardons

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's family hotel business has lost a bid to regain control of the luxury hotel in Panama that ousted his brand, according to a new emergency arbitration ruling.

headline.print_headline: Trump Hotel Business Fails to Undo Panama Coup
headline.main: Trump Hotel Business Fails to Undo Panama Coup

docs.snippet: "Roseanne," the 1990s television comedy about a working-class American family, scored monster ratings on its return to ABC after 20 years, attracting more than 18 million viewers.

headline.print_headline: 'Roseanne' Returns With Monster TV Ratings in Trump Era
headline.main: 'Roseanne' Returns With Monster TV Ratings in Trump Era

docs.snippet: Hundreds of school districts across the country have given staff access to guns, seeing the weaponry not as a political statement but a practical response to a potent threat.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Call to Arm Teachers Resonates at Schools That Do
headline.main: Trump Wants to Arm Teachers. These Schools Already Do.

docs.snippet: The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.

headline.print_headline: Trump on Twitter (April 2): DACA, NAFTA, Amazon
headline.main: Trump on Twitter (April 2): DACA, NAFTA, Amazon

docs.snippet: Rev. Samuel Rodriguez represents a singular voice in the immigration debate — the rare Latino in a small clique of evangelicals advising President Trump.

headline.print_headline: A Latino Evangelical Who Holds Trump’s Ear on Immigration
headline.main: ‘I Know I Will Be Criticized’: The Latino Evangelical Who Advises Trump on Immigration

docs.snippet: Leaders of Orange County, California on Tuesday voted to join a federal lawsuit against the state's sanctuary law as part of a growing backlash in some conservative parts of California to state laws that protect illegal immigrants from deportation...

headline.print_headline: California County Joins Trump 'Sanctuary City' Lawsuit
headline.main: California County Joins Trump 'Sanctuary City' Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Jimmy López and Nilo Cruz were asked to write a choral piece about young undocumented immigrants. Then President Trump was elected.

headline.print_headline: An Oratorio On Dreamers  Changes Key
headline.main: After Trump, an Oratorio About ‘Dreamers’ Changes Key
